EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Consultant Services Email - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Tom, Yes this is an automatic email but I am glad you found some of the links useful anyhow! J I will check in with Marcelle to see where she is at in setting up your registration. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Tom Erickson [mailto:terickson@apnbok.com] Sent: Saturday, May 05, 2012 7:42 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Thomas Erickson Thanks, Sara. Considering we had seen each other only a day before Im guessing this was a broadcast to all your current clients. Thank you for the link. Several of the topics are of great interest to me at present. By the way, I have not had a response from Marcelle yet. Tom From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Friday, May 04, 2012 10:44 AM To: terickson@apnbok.com <mailto:terickson@apnbok.com> Subject: MBO Partners / Thomas Erickson Hello Thomas, I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going. We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xMzYmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTEzNiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODc1NTMmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ3MTkzNDMmZW1haWxpZD10ZXJpY2tzb25AYXBuYm9rLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMTI4NTEtMTE0MzM5NyZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56uguWq6xlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know! Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com></html
